local_intent: Place the held glass bottle down onto the table and confirm surface contact before release.
assumptions: Glass bottle is already grasped and secure
A clear table surface is available within reach
Contact sensing reflects table contact when lowering
coherence_with_global: Implements the MainTree PlaceDown phase only; it verifies the bottle is held, makes gentle surface contact, executes PlaceDown, and confirms contact. It leaves opening the gripper and retreating to subsequent global steps.
